mainBoard.name: Karn Liberated
mainBoard.originalText:
+4: Target player exiles a card from their hand.
−3: Exile target permanent.
−14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

rulings.text: A game that restarts immediately ends the preceding game. The players in that game then immediately begin a new game. No player wins, loses, or draws the original game as a result of Karn's ability.

After the pregame procedure is complete but before the new game's first turn, Karn's ability finishes resolving and the cards left in exile are put onto the battlefield. If this causes any triggered abilities to trigger, those abilities are put onto the stack at the beginning of the first upkeep step.
Any permanents put onto the battlefield with Karn's ability that entered the battlefield tapped will untap during their controller's first untap step.
If a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well. If you leave the game, the permanents you control from Karn's ability are exiled.

In a Commander game, each player puts their commander into the command zone before shuffling their deck, unless it was exiled with Karn. In that case, the commander remains in exile and will be put onto the battlefield when Karn's ability finishes resolving.
In a multiplayer game, any player who left the game before it was restarted with Karn's ability won't be involved in the new game.

Karn's first and third abilities are linked. Similarly, Karn's second and third abilities are linked. Only non-Aura permanent cards exiled by either of Karn's first two abilities will remain in exile when the game restarts.

No actions taken in the game that was restarted apply to the new game. For example, if you were dealt damage by Stigma Lasher in the original game, the effect that states you can't gain life doesn't carry over to the new game.

Permanents put onto the battlefield due to Karn's ability will have been under the starting controller's control continuously since the beginning of that player's first turn. Creatures among them can attack and their activated abilities with {T} in the cost can be activated.
Players can't move cards between their deck and sideboard before the new game.
Players won't have any counters or emblems they had in the original game.
The number of times a player has cast their commander from the command zone resets to zero. The amount of combat damage dealt to players by each commander is reset to 0.

The player who controlled the ability that restarted the game is the starting player in the new game. The new game starts like a game normally does: Each player shuffles their deck (except the cards left in exile by Karn's ability). Each player's life total becomes 20 (or the starting life total for whatever format you're playing). Players draw a hand of seven cards. Players may take mulligans. Players may take actions based on cards in their opening hands, such as those of Leylines.

mainBoard.text:
[+4]: Target player exiles a card from their hand.

mainBoard.name: Walking Ballista
mainBoard.originalText:
Walking Ballista enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{4}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Walking Ballista.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Walking Ballista: It deals 1 damage to any target.

rulings.text: A casting cost of {X}{X} means that you pay twice X. If you want X to be 3, you pay {6} to cast Walking Ballista.

If Walking Ballista has been dealt damage or had its toughness reduced by an effect, this limits how many times you'll be able to remove +1/+1 counters from it in a single turn. For example, if it has three +1/+1 counters on it and has been dealt 1 damage this turn, it will be destroyed immediately after you activate the ability a second time and you won't be able to activate it a third time.

foreignData.text:
次元の大地図はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
次元の大地図が戦場に出たとき、あなたはあなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード４枚を見てもよい。そうしたなら、その中から土地・カード最大１枚を公開し、そのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に、残りを一番下に無作為の順番で置く。
{T}：{C}を加える。

foreignData.name: 时空图集
foreignData.text:
时空图集须横置进战场。
当时空图集进战场时，你可以检视你牌库顶的四张牌。若你如此作，则展示其中至多一张地牌，然后将该牌置于你的牌库顶，其余则以随机顺序置于你牌库底。
{T}：加{C}。

mainBoard.name: Planar Atlas
mainBoard.originalText:
Planar Atlas enters the battlefield tapped.
When Planar Atlas enters the battlefield, you may look at the top four cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order.
{T}: Add {C}.
mainBoard.text:
Planar Atlas enters tapped.
When Planar Atlas enters, you may look at the top four cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order.
{T}: Add {C}.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"A few drops of this, and the trickiest problems simply melt away."
—Thamaz, Weldfast inventor

foreignData.flavorText:
„Ein paar Tropfen davon, und selbst die heikelsten Probleme lösen sich in Wohlgefallen auf."
—Thamaz, Bronzeviertel-Erfinder
foreignData.name: Universal-Lösungsmittel
foreignData.text: {7}, {T}, opfere das Universal-Lösungsmittel: Zerstöre eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Unas pocas gotas y los obstáculos más complicados desaparecen sin más".
—Thamaz, inventora de Sueldafirme
foreignData.name: Disolvente universal
foreignData.text: {7}, {T}, sacrificar el Disolvente universal: Destruye el permanente objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Il suffit de quelques gouttes pour faire disparaître les problèmes les plus complexes. »
—Thamaz, inventeur de Vive-Soudure
foreignData.name: Solvant universel
foreignData.text: {7}, {T}, sacrifiez le Solvant universel : Détruisez un permanent ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Bastano poche gocce e i problemi più complessi svaniscono."
—Thamaz, inventrice della Saldapoli
foreignData.name: Solvente Universale
foreignData.text: {7}, {T}, Sacrifica il Solvente Universale: Distruggi un permanente bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText:
「これ数滴で、どんな問題も解決よ。」
――速接会の発明者、ターマズ
foreignData.name: 万能溶剤
foreignData.text: {7},{T},万能溶剤を生け贄に捧げる：パーマネント１つを対象とする。それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText:
「只消几滴，最棘手的问题也会溶于无形。」
～焊锢区发明家泰玛慈
foreignData.name: 万溶剂
foreignData.text: {7}，{T}，牺牲万溶剂：消灭目标永久物。

mainBoard.name: Universal Solvent
mainBoard.originalText: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Universal Solvent: Destroy target permanent.
mainBoard.text: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Universal Solvent: Destroy target permanent.

mainBoard.flavorText: A weapon best suited for those with good aim and steady hands.

foreignData.flavorText: Eine Waffe für diejenigen mit gutem Augenmaß und ruhigem Händchen.
foreignData.name: Phiole des Alchemisten
foreignData.text:
Wenn die Phiole des Alchemisten ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte.
{1}, {T}, opfere die Phiole des Alchemisten: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl kann in diesem Zug nicht angreifen oder blocken.

foreignData.flavorText: Un arma especialmente indicada para aquellos con buena puntería y pulso firme.
foreignData.name: Frasco del alquimista
foreignData.text:
Cuando el Frasco del alquimista entre al campo de batalla, roba una carta.
{1}, {T}, sacrificar el Frasco del alquimista: La criatura objetivo no puede atacar ni bloquear este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Une arme pour laquelle il vaut mieux savoir viser et avoir une main assurée.
foreignData.name: Fiole de l'alchimiste
foreignData.text:
Quand la Fiole de l'alchimiste arrive sur le champ de bataille, piochez une carte.
{1}, {T}, sacrifiez la Fiole de l'alchimiste : Une créature ciblée ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: L'arma più adatta per coloro che hanno una buona mira e una mano ferma.
foreignData.name: Fiala dell'Alchimista
foreignData.text:
Quando la Fiala dell'Alchimista entra nel campo di battaglia, pesca una carta.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifica la Fiala dell'Alchimista: Una creatura bersaglio non può attaccare o bloccare in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 狙いが確かで、手が安定している者にとっては最高の武器となる。
foreignData.name: 錬金術師の薬瓶
foreignData.text:
錬金術師の薬瓶が戦場に出たとき、カード１枚を引く。
{1},{T},錬金術師の薬瓶を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それでは攻撃もブロックもできない。

foreignData.flavorText: 这武器最适合瞄得准、拿得稳的人。
foreignData.name: 炼金术士药瓶
foreignData.text:
当炼金术士药瓶进战场时，抓一张牌。
{1}，{T}，牺牲炼金术士药瓶：目标生物本回合不能进行攻击或阻挡。

mainBoard.name: Alchemist's Vial
mainBoard.originalText:
When Alchemist's Vial enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Alchemist's Vial: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

rulings.text: Activating the last ability of Alchemist’s Vial targeting a creature that’s already attacking or blocking won’t cause that creature to stop attacking or blocking. It will prevent that creature from attacking or blocking in any additional combat phases the turn may have (although this is unusual).

mainBoard.text:
When Alchemist's Vial enters, draw a card.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Alchemist's Vial: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I use maps to find out where explorers have already been. Then I go the other way."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

foreignData.flavorText:
„Ich verwende Landkarten, um herauszufinden, wo schon Entdecker waren. Dann gehe ich in die andere Richtung."
—Javad Nasrin, Reliktsammler aus Ondu
foreignData.name: Expeditionskarte
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, opfere die Expeditionskarte: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Länderkarte, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische danach.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Uso mapas para saber por dónde ya han ido los exploradores. Luego voy para el otro lado".
—Javad Nasrin, cazadora de reliquias de Ondu
foreignData.name: Mapa de la expedición
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, sacrificar el Mapa de la expedición: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra, muéstrala, ponla en tu mano y luego baraja.

foreignData.flavorText:
« J'utilise les cartes pour déterminer où les explorateurs ont déjà été. Ensuite, je prends la direction opposée. »
—Javad Nasrin, chasseuse de relique du Ondou
foreignData.name: Carte d'expédition
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, sacrifiez la Carte d'expédition : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain, révélez-la, mettez-la dans votre main, puis mélangez.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Uso le mappe per scoprire dove sono già stati gli esploratori. Poi vado dall'altra parte."
—Javad Nasrin, cacciatrice di reliquie di Ondu
foreignData.name: Mappa della Spedizione
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifica la Mappa della Spedizione: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola.

foreignData.flavorText:
「俺が地図を使うのは、探検家がどこへ行ったかを知るためだ。で、俺は違う方へ行くのさ。」
――オンドゥの遺物狩り、ジャヴァド・ナスリン
foreignData.name: 探検の地図
foreignData.text: {2},{T},探検の地図を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから土地・カード１枚を探し、公開し、あなたの手札に加える。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignData.flavorText:
「我使用地图来确认探险家曾到过哪些地方。然后我就走别的路。」
～昂度猎宝人贾维纳金
foreignData.name: 探险地图
foreignData.text: {2}，{T}，牺牲探险地图：从你牌库中搜寻一张地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

mainBoard.name: Expedition Map
mainBoard.originalText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

rulings.text: You may find any land card, not just a basic land card.

mainBoard.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Though their ideals are leagues apart, Urza's and Mishra's creations have a surprising harmony with one another."
—Tocasia, journal entry

foreignData.flavorText:
„Obwohl ihre Weltbilder so unterschiedlich sind, harmonieren Urzas und Mishras Kreationen erstaunlich gut miteinander."
—Aus dem Tagebuch von Tocasia
foreignData.name: Urzas Fabrik
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{7}, {T}: Erzeuge einen 2/2 farblosen Montagearbeiter-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Aunque sus ideales están muy apartados, las creaciones de Urza y Mishra conservan una sorprendente armonía entre ellas".
—Del diario de Tocasia
foreignData.name: Factoría de Urza
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{7}, {T}: Crea una ficha de criatura artefacto Operario incolora 2/2.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Bien que leurs idéaux soient opposés, les créations d'Urza et de Mishra sont dotées d'une surprenante harmonie. »
—Tocasia, extrait de journal
foreignData.name: Usine d'Urza
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{7}, {T} : Créez un jeton de créature-artefact 2/2 incolore Ouvrier spécialisé.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Sebbene i loro ideali siano diametralmente opposti, le creazioni di Urza e di Mishra presentano una sorprendente armonia tra loro."
—Tocasia, annotazione del diario
foreignData.name: Fabbrica di Urza
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{7}, {T}: Crea una pedina creatura artefatto Addetto-al-Montaggio 2/2 incolore.

foreignData.flavorText:
「ウルザとミシュラの理想は遥かに距離があるが、互いの創造物には驚くべき調和がある。」
――トカシアの日記
foreignData.name: ウルザの工廠
foreignData.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{7},{T}：無色の２/２の組立作業員・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。

foreignData.flavorText:
「虽然他俩的理念南辕北辙，克撒与米斯拉所造之物却高度地彼此呼应。」
～托卡西雅的日志片段
foreignData.name: 克撒的工厂
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{7}，{T}：派出一个2/2无色组装工人衍生神器生物。

mainBoard.name: Urza's Factory
mainBoard.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{7}, {T}: Create a 2/2 colorless Assembly-Worker artifact creature token.

rulings.text: Urza's is a land subtype that has no inherent rules meaning. Other effects may refer to it.

mainBoard.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{7}, {T}: Create a 2/2 colorless Assembly-Worker artifact creature token.

mainBoard.flavorText: Urza studied the creations of the Thran not simply to learn from them, but to surpass them.

foreignData.flavorText: Urza studierte die Schöpfungen der Thran nicht nur, um von ihnen zu lernen, sondern um sie zu übertreffen.
foreignData.name: Urzas Turm
foreignData.text: {T}: Erzeuge {C}. Falls du ein Urzas-Bergwerk und ein Urzas-Kraftwerk kontrollierst, erzeuge stattdessen {C}{C}{C}.

foreignData.flavorText: Urza estudió las creaciones de los thran no solo para aprender de ellos, sino para superarlos.
foreignData.name: Torre de Urza
foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega {C}. Si controlas una Mina de Urza y una Central de energía de Urza, en vez de eso, agrega {C}{C}{C}.

foreignData.flavorText: Urza studiò le creazioni dei Thran non solo per imparare da esse, ma per superarle.
foreignData.name: Torre di Urza
foreignData.text: {T}: Aggiungi {C}. Se controlli una Miniera di Urza e una Centrale Energetica di Urza, aggiungi invece {C}{C}.

foreignData.flavorText: 克撒钻研索蓝造物，不仅从中学习，更欲凌驾其上。
foreignData.name: 克撒的塔
foreignData.text: {T}：加{C}。如果你操控「克撒的／矿脉」和「克撒的／动力炉」，则改为加{C}{C}{C}。

mainBoard.name: Urza's Tower
mainBoard.originalText: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

rulings.text: The ability checks for land types, not the names of other permanents you control.

mainBoard.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: Urza threw himself into his research, pushing the boundaries of both possibility and morality.

foreignData.flavorText: Urza stürzte sich in seine Forschungen und ging dabei an die Grenzen des Möglichen und der Moral.
foreignData.name: Urzas Kraftwerk
foreignData.text: {T}: Erzeuge {C}. Falls du ein Urzas-Bergwerk und einen Urzas-Turm kontrollierst, erzeuge stattdessen {C}{C}.

foreignData.flavorText: Urza se sumergió en su investigación, en la que puso a prueba los límites de la posibilidad y la moralidad.
foreignData.name: Central de energía de Urza
foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega {C}. Si controlas una Mina de Urza y una Torre de Urza, en vez de eso, agrega {C}{C}.

foreignData.flavorText: Urza se plongea dans ses recherches, repoussant les limites du possible et de la morale.
foreignData.name: Centrale énergétique d'Urza
foreignData.text: {T} : Ajoutez {C}. Si vous contrôlez une Mine d'Urza et une Tour d'Urza, ajoutez {C}{C} à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: Urza si tuffò nella sua ricerca, sorpassando i limiti di ciò che era possibile o etico.
foreignData.name: Centrale Energetica di Urza
foreignData.text: {T}: Aggiungi {C}. Se controlli una Miniera di Urza e una Torre di Urza, aggiungi invece {C}{C}.

foreignData.flavorText: ウルザは自らの研究に身を投じ、可能性と道徳性それぞれの限界を踏み越えた。
foreignData.name: ウルザの魔力炉
foreignData.text: {T}：{C}を加える。あなたがウルザの・鉱山とウルザの・塔をコントロールしているなら、代わりに{C}{C}を加える。
foreignData.type: 土地 — ウルザの・魔力炉

foreignData.flavorText: 克撒全力投入其研究，一再突破可能性与道德的边界。

foreignData.text: {T}：加{C}。如果你操控「克撒的／矿脉」和「克撒的／塔」，则改为加{C}{C}。

The ability checks for land types, not the names of other permanents you control.

mainBoard.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: In his hunger for power and knowledge, Urza dug deep into Dominaria's ancient past.

foreignData.flavorText: In seinem Hunger nach Macht und Wissen bohrte Urza tief in die alte Vergangenheit Dominarias hinein.
foreignData.name: Urzas Bergwerk
foreignData.text: {T}: Erzeuge {C}. Falls du ein Urzas-Kraftwerk und einen Urzas-Turm kontrollierst, erzeuge stattdessen {C}{C}.

foreignData.flavorText: Sediento de poder y conocimiento, Urza ahondó en el pasado lejano de Dominaria.
